title: The Wise Man's Fear
description: Alternate cover edition ISBN 0575081430 / 9780575081437Picking up the tale of Kvothe Kingkiller once again, we follow him into exile, into political intrigue, courtship, adventure, love and magic - and further along the path that has turned Kvothe, the mightiest magician of his age, a legend in his own time, into Kote, the unassuming pub landlord.
author: Patrick Rothfuss
